title: enna puNNiyam nAn
sahitya:
enna puNNiyam nAn paNNinEnO murugA un pugazghai shentamizh innisaippAkkaL Akka


anupallavi

  tan nigharEyinri nI dayai puriginravan enbadan sAnrAgha enpAl adu tOnravE


caraNam    maNNulaga bhOgamadil ennuLamIDu paTTu kaNNum karuttumAgha karpanaik-kOTTai kaTTa
eNNi EmArAmal aNNalE unnait-tudi paNNum ippAmAlai punaindu magizhndiDa
